Text: Image caption   The launch of the new Routemaster was a high point for Wrightbus  The top company in the Wright business, the Cornerstone Group, showed the firm made a loss of £1.7m in 2017.
Cause: Image caption   The launch of the new Routemaster
Effect: The top company in the Wright business, the Cornerstone Group, showed the firm made a loss of £1.7m in 2017.
